name: Calm - Yogi Pop (Mofoz Visualz x Karthik)
description:
This art started it’s life as an ink wash drawing. The process started by randomly dripping ink and water onto paper which creates an interesting and otherworldly blend of colors. 
With this particular one, the meditative woman came jumping out to me. All I had to do was add a few lines. Her calm look serves as a reminder for you to slow down and recalibrate your intentions and energy.

When I had the idea to animate this, I knew exactly what musician to turn to pair her with. Karthik is a very spiritual individual, yogi, aaaaand a prolific musician. The intro to Karthik’s track “Yogi Pop” lends a deeply meditative hand to the work as it enchants and slow dances with your soul.

Includes link to drive with access to: 
Link to 1200x2000 MP4
750x1200 MP4
500x800 MP4
Yogi Pop by Karthik M4A
